Package installation
====================

Please follow the few instructions below in order to install the mpsrad's package.

.. important::
   This tutorial is only effective with pip !

* Download the package from Github
* Open a terminal from the mpsrad folder
* Install the package with::

   pip install -e .

* Make sure to use pyserial and not serial with::

   - pip uninstall serial
   - pip uninstall pyserial
   - pip install pyserial

Now the package is installed and ready to use !
